titleStmt.title: Edinburgh, the eighth day of November, 1655. Whereas his Highnesse council in Scotland by their ordinance of the 31 of October last, have ordained, that the prices for every common-bill shall be sixpence sterling ...
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Commissioners for Administration of Justice in Scotland.
Smith, George, 1602 or 3-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Christopher Higgins, in Harts-Close, over against the Trone-Church,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
Most of text in double columns.
Order to print signed: Geo. Smyth, President.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
